clickRoutine.header: Add this many points to your score:

clickRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 1 of 2: only add value if it is an integer

thenRoutine.note: Sanity check / typo avoidance 2 of 2: only add value if it is a three-digit number

loopRoutine.comment: Default variable name is the name of the property, so we use that in LABEL below

fields.text: You're about to start a new round. Are you sure?

info.name: Field Trip
info.attribution:
Game layout, library image, and scripting by Robin Harn, released to the Public Domain under CC0.

The following graphics are from https://game-icons.net and are used under CC BY 3.0:
* Card Joker https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/card-joker.html

The bus and rainbow graphics are from Google Noto Color Emoji and are used under the SIL Open Font License: https://fonts.google.com/noto/specimen/Noto+Color+Emoji

The following graphics are from http://www.freepik.com and are used under the Freepik license:
* Arid Landscape 
https://www.freepik.com/free-vector/arid-landscape-background-with-road-sunset_1016232.htm
info.description: Explore trails out in the desert, but make your way back to safety before it's too late!
